Yeum

Group (2021-2022):
Azer Blossom

Introduction

Yeum (예음) is a South Korean singer. She was a part of the original duo members of PRIMROSE signed with AO Entertainment. She is also a former member of the girl group Azer Blossom. On March 23, 2023, the agency announced her departure from the once duo, citing personal and health issues as the cause.
